properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 6:29AM PST until January 14 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Winds have decreased below critical threshold this
morning and the first Lake Wind Advisory has been allowed to
expire...A new Lake Wind Advisory will begin this afternoon and
continue through Wednesday afternoon.

* WHAT...Northwest winds this morning around 10 mph with gusts up
to 20 mph...becoming West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph
expected late this afternoon. Winds will further increase
overnight becoming southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 45 to 50
mph. Waves up to 2 feet this morning becoming 2 to 4 feet this
afternoon.

* WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST TUESDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
